initialContext: Please provide a comprehensive summary or insights about 'Pattern-Oriented Software Architecture Volume 4: A Pattern Language for Distributed Computing' (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pattern-Oriented_Software_Architecture)(ISBN 978-0470059029). This book explores various architectural software patterns in detail. Specifically, elaborate on the following topics discussed within the context of software architecture: Domain model; Layers; Model-View-Controller(MVC); Presentation-Abstraction-Control(PAC); Microkernel; Reflection; Pipes and filters; Shared respository; Blackboard; Domain object.You are a software architect specializing in pattern detection. Your task is to analyze the provided log file and identify all distinct patterns within it and provide the total number of patterns detected. For each identified pattern, provide the following details: 1) A brief but clear description of each pattern, including its purpose or significance; 2) How certain you are about that pattern being on the log file. Ensure your output is concise, well-structured, and easy to understand.

error_messages.service_unavailable: The AI model is currently unavailable due to high demand. Please try again in a few minutes.

gemini_prompts.follow_up: Provide a detailed analysis of the software engineering process.
